title: The Minazuki Family's Fiance - On My 16Th Birthday, The Head Of The Main Family Came To Pick Me Up
alternative_title: 水無月家の許嫁 ～十六歳の誕生日、本家の当主が迎えに来ました。～ ; Minazuki-ke no Iinazuke - Juurokusai no Tanjoubi; Honke no Toushuu ga Mukae ni Kimashita
status: 水無月家の許嫁 ～十六歳の誕生日、本家の当主が迎えに来ました。～ ; Minazuki-ke no Iinazuke - Juurokusai no Tanjoubi; Honke no Toushuu ga Mukae ni Kimashita
description:
Description :
        Minazuki Rika , a girl who lost her only family, her father, to a strange illness and became lonely for the rest of her life.. As she loses her reason for living, a young man who claims to be the head of the Minazuki family appears and tells her a shocking truth.. "You and I are  betrothed ."Rika knew nothing until this day.. About her father, the family rules, and the fact that the Minazuki family is the "descendants of the celestial maidens" represented in the legend of Hagoromo..
